---
title: "Swift SDK"
---

import { Aside, CardGrid, LinkCard } from '@astrojs/starlight/components';

**Libra2Kit** is a Swift SDK for interacting with the Libra2 blockchain.
It provides a simple and easy-to-use interface for interacting with the Libra2
blockchain.

The SDK is a Swift package export for [Klibra2](/build/sdks/community-sdks/kotlin-sdk), a Kotlin SDK for
the Libra2 blockchain. It is build by making its iOS binary available as a
dependency to iOS developers working on native Swift projects.

<Aside type="note">
  **Libra2Kit** is currently under development, please give feedback [here](https://github.com/mcxross/swift-libra2/issues)
</Aside>

## Installation

To install **Libra2Kit**, add the following to your `Package.swift` file:

```swift filename="Package.swift"
dependencies: [
    .package(url: "https://github.com/mcxross/swift-libra2.git", .upToNextMajor(from: <version>))
]
```
